title: Liverpool transfer news and rumours: James Maddison and Suso
description: All the latest Liverpool transfer news and rumours from across the British and European press on Tuesday, January 16.
content: Liverpool are plotting a summer swoop for James Maddison from Norwich at the end of the season, according to the Daily Mirror.Premier League rivals Tottenham and Southampton have also been linked with the 21-year-old, who has lit up the Sky Bet Championship this season.Liverpool midfielder Marko Grujic is likely to go on loan to a Championship club for the second half of the season, according to the Liverpool Echo.Liverpool want the 21-year-old Serbian to get more playing time after making only five appearances in all competitions this term. He signed from Red Star in the summer of 2016.Liverpool have been warned off making a move for former winger Suso, according to Italian outlet Tuttosport.The Spaniard, who spent five years at Liverpool before leaving in 2015, has impressed in Serie A this term, but the Italian side reportedly say they would not even consider Â£80m for the 24-year-old.
